content: {"name": "Our Lady Of Sorrows (CCCS)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call Mondays or Wednesdays between 10am and 4 pm, to make an appointment.", "email": "", "url": "https://olsnyc.org/contact-us", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "103 Pitt St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10002", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7194735, "longitude": -73.98238429999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 886-9854", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
